accounts to users and applications helps avoid eavesdropping and man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.
The secure transfer option enhances the security of a storage account by only allowing requests
to the storage account by a secure connection.","recommendation":"Modify the configuration of your Storage accounts and set the \"Secure transfer required\" option to Enabled.
